Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides protect coho salmon from Vibrio anguillarum infections.
Literature.Author: Jia X, Patrzykat A, Devlin RH, Ackerman PA, Iwama GK, Hancock RE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Vibrio anguillarum(MIC=64µg/ml),Aeromonas salmonicida(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028s(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar typhimurium MS7953s(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa Z61(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis C621(MIC=>64µg/ml)
